languages.text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.
languages.original_text:
При следующей атаке архмилитанта все цели, получившие попадание, должны пройти проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}. При провале цели получают негативный эффект в зависимости от типа урона атаки:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Ударный урон{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывает{/g} цель на 1 раунд.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Пронзающий и {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g} накладывают на цель эффекты кровотечения и замедления до конца боя.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Энергетический и любой другой урон ослепляют цель до конца боя.</indent>
Урон от силовых мечей и топоров считается одновременно энергетическим и раздирающим, а от силовых молотов — энергетическим и ударным. Если атака сочетает в себе несколько типов урона, применяется эффект, соответствующий каждому типу.

traits.locale_text:
The Veteran's next attack, if hit, will make all the targets pass a Toughness resistance test with a −<u>(2 × Veteran's BS bonus or WS bonus, whichever is higher)</u> penalty, or suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>Impact damage makes the target prone for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and rending damage make the target bleeding and slowed until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage make the target blinded until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

The Veteran's next attack, if {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g}, will cause all the targets to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If failed, the targets will suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g} based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Energy{/g} and all other damage inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts bleeding and slowed on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts blinded on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

languages.text:
如果首席战士的下次攻击命中目标，则所有受影响的目标都需要进行坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}减值。如果目标未能通过检定，则会承受负面效果，取决于伤害类型：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}会导致目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一轮。</indent>
- <indent=5%>穿透与{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}会导致目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>能量与所有其它类型伤害，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
能量剑与能量斧同时算作能量伤害与撕裂伤害，能量锤同时算作能量伤害与冲击伤害。如果单次攻击有多种伤害类型，则每种伤害类型都会进行结算。
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

traits.locale_text:
如果老兵的下次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标，则所有受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于<u>（2×老兵的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}加值，以较高者为准）</u>。如果目标未能通过检定，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}，取决于攻击类型：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}会导致目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>穿透与{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}会导致目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}能量{/g}与所有其它类型伤害，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
能量剑与能量斧同时算作能量伤害与撕裂伤害，能量锤同时算作能量伤害与冲击伤害。如果单次攻击有多种伤害类型，则每种伤害类型都会进行结算。

如果老兵的下次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标，则所有受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会额外受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}。如果目标未能通过检定，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}，取决于攻击类型：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}会导致目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>穿透与{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}会导致目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}能量{/g}与所有其它类型伤害，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
能量剑与能量斧同时算作能量伤害与撕裂伤害，能量锤同时算作能量伤害与冲击伤害。如果单次攻击有多种伤害类型，则每种伤害类型都会进行结算。

如果首席战士的下次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标，则所有受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}于。如果目标未能通过检定，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，取决于{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}类型：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}会导致目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>穿透与{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}会导致目标{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}能量{/g}与所有其它类型伤害，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
能量剑与能量斧同时算作能量伤害与撕裂伤害，能量锤同时算作能量伤害与冲击伤害。如果单次攻击有多种伤害类型，则每种伤害类型都会进行结算。

languages.text:
Si el siguiente ataque del Archimilitante impacta, obliga a todos los objetivos a superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Resistencia con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}. Cualquier objetivo que falle sufrirá un efecto negativo que depende del tipo de daño del ataque:
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derriba{/g} al objetivo durante 1 asalto.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El daño perforante o {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}acerado{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} al objetivo hasta el final del combate.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El daño por energía y de cualquier otro tipo inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} al objetivo hasta el final del combate.</indent>
Las espadas de energía y las hachas de energía cuentan como daño por energía y acerado, mientras que los martillos de energía cuentan como daño por energía e impactante. Los ataques que combinan varios tipos de daño infligen todos los efectos adicionales correspondientes.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

traits.locale_text:
Si el siguiente ataque del Archimilitante {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}, obliga a todos los enemigos a superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}. Cualquier objetivo que falle sufrirá un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} que depende del tipo de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} del ataque:
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derriba{/g} al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El daño perforante o {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}acerado{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} al objetivo hasta el final del combate.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}daño por energía{/g} y de cualquier otro tipo inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} al objetivo hasta el final del combate.</indent>
Las espadas de energía y las hachas de energía cuentan como daño por energía y acerado, mientras que los martillos de energía cuentan como daño por energía e impactante. Los ataques que combinan varios tipos de daño infligen todos los efectos adicionales correspondientes.

Si el siguiente ataque del veterano {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g}, obliga a todos los enemigos a superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}. Cualquier objetivo que falle sufrirá un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} que depende del tipo de daño del ataque:
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derriba{/g} al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El daño perforante o {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}acerado{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} al objetivo hasta el final del combate.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El daño por {g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}energía{/g} y de cualquier otro tipo inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} al objetivo hasta el final del combate.</indent>
Las espadas de energía y las hachas de energía cuentan como daño por energía y acerado, mientras que los martillos de energía cuentan como daño por energía e impactante. Los ataques que combinan varios tipos de daño infligen todos los efectos adicionales correspondientes.

languages.text:
アーク・ミリタントの次の攻撃がヒットした場合、すべてのターゲットが−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}のペナルティを受けた状態でTGH{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗した場合、ターゲットは攻撃のダメージタイプに応じてマイナス効果が適用される：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}によりターゲットを1ラウンドだけ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}させる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>貫通および{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}は、戦闘終了までターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}およ{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}を与える。</indent>
-<indent=5%>エネルギーとその他のダメージは、戦闘が終了するまでターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}にする。</indent>
パワーソードとパワーアックスはエネルギーと裂傷ダメージとしてカウントされ、パワーハンマーはエネルギーと衝撃ダメージとしてカウントされる。複数の種類のダメージを組み合わせた攻撃は、それぞれの追加効果の恩恵を受ける。
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

traits.locale_text:
アーク・ミリタントの次の攻撃がヒットした場合、すべてのターゲットが−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}のペナルティを受けた状態でTGH{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗した場合、ターゲットは攻撃のダメージタイプに応じてマイナス効果が適用される：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}によりターゲットを1ラウンドだけ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}させる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>貫通および{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}は、戦闘終了までターゲットに出血およ速度低下を与える。</indent>
-<indent=5%>エネルギーとその他のダメージは、戦闘が終了するまでターゲットを盲目にする。</indent>
パワーソードとパワーアックスはエネルギーと裂傷ダメージとしてカウントされ、パワーハンマーはエネルギーと衝撃ダメージとしてカウントされる。複数の種類のダメージを組み合わせた攻撃は、それぞれの追加効果の恩恵を受ける。

古参（ベテラン）の次の攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}した場合、すべてのターゲットが−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}を受けなければならない。不合格の場合、ターゲットは攻撃のダメージタイプに応じて{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}が適用される：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}はターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}だけ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}させる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>貫通および{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}は、戦闘終了までターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速{/g}を与える。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}エネルギー{/g}とその他のダメージは、戦闘が終了するまでターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}にする。</indent>
パワーソードとパワーアックスはエネルギーと裂傷ダメージとしてカウントされ、パワーハンマーはエネルギーと衝撃ダメージとしてカウントされる。複数の種類のダメージを組み合わせた攻撃は、それぞれの追加効果の恩恵を受ける。

アーク・ミリタントの次の攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}した場合、すべてのターゲットが−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}を受けなければならない。不合格の場合、ターゲットは攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}タイプに応じて{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}が適用される：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}はターゲットを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}だけ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}させる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>貫通および{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}は、戦闘終了までターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}減速{/g}を与える。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}エネルギー{/g}とその他のダメージは、戦闘が終了するまでターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}にする。</indent>
パワーソードとパワーアックスはエネルギーと裂傷ダメージとしてカウントされ、パワーハンマーはエネルギーと衝撃ダメージとしてカウントされる。複数の種類のダメージを組み合わせた攻撃は、それぞれの追加効果の恩恵を受ける。

アーク・ミリタントの次の攻撃がヒットした場合、すべてのターゲットが−{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}のペナルティを受けた状態でTGH{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗した場合、ターゲットは攻撃のダメージタイプに応じてマイナス効果が適用される：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}によりターゲットを1ラウンドだけ{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}させる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>貫通および{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}は、戦闘終了までターゲットに出血およ速度低下を与える。</indent>
-<indent=5%>エネルギーとその他のダメージは、戦闘が終了するまでターゲットを盲目にする。</indent>
パワーソードとパワーアックスはエネルギーと裂傷ダメージとしてカウントされ、パワーハンマーはエネルギーと衝撃ダメージとしてカウントされる。複数の種類のダメージを組み合わせた攻撃は、それぞれの追加効果の恩恵を受ける。

languages.text:
При следующей атаке архмилитанта все цели, получившие попадание, должны пройти проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}. При провале цели получают негативный эффект в зависимости от типа урона атаки:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Ударный урон{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывает{/g} цель на 1 раунд.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Пронзающий и {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g} накладывают на цель эффекты кровотечения и замедления до конца боя.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Энергетический и любой другой урон ослепляют цель до конца боя.</indent>
Урон от силовых мечей и топоров считается одновременно энергетическим и раздирающим, а от силовых молотов — энергетическим и ударным. Если атака сочетает в себе несколько типов урона, применяется эффект, соответствующий каждому типу.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

traits.locale_text:
При следующей атаке ветерана все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, должны пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g} или бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}ББ{/g} ветерана)</u> (используется бонус, значение которого выше). При провале цели получают {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативный эффект{/g} в зависимости от типа урона атаки:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Ударный урон{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывает{/g} цель на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Пронзающий{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g} накладывают на цель эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} до конца боя.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Энергетический{/g} и любой другой урон {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепляют{/g} цель до конца боя.</indent>
Урон от силовых мечей и топоров считается одновременно энергетическим и раздирающим, а от силовых молотов — энергетическим и ударным. Если атака сочетает в себе несколько типов урона, применяется эффект, соответствующий каждому типу.

При следующей атаке ветерана все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, должны пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}ДБ{/g} или бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}ББ{/g} ветерана)</u> (используется бонус, значение которого выше). При провале цели получают {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативный эффект{/g} в зависимости от типа урона атаки:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Ударный урон{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывает{/g} цель на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Пронзающий{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g} накладывают на цель эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} до конца боя.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Энергетический{/g} и любой другой урон {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепляют{/g} цель до конца боя.</indent>
Урон от силовых мечей и топоров считается одновременно энергетическим и раздирающим, а от силовых молотов — энергетическим и ударным. Если атака сочетает в себе несколько типов урона, применяется эффект, соответствующий каждому типу.

При следующей атаке ветерана все цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, должны пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} (используется бонус, значение которого выше). При провале цели получают {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативный эффект{/g} в зависимости от типа урона атаки:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Ударный урон{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывает{/g} цель на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}Пронзающий{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающий урон{/g} накладывают на цель эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} до конца боя.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Энергетический{/g} и любой другой урон {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепляют{/g} цель до конца боя.</indent>
Урон от силовых мечей и топоров считается одновременно энергетическим и раздирающим, а от силовых молотов — энергетическим и ударным. Если атака сочетает в себе несколько типов урона, применяется эффект, соответствующий каждому типу.

languages.text:
Wenn der nächste Angriff des Erzmilitanten trifft, müssen alle Ziele eine Zähigkeit-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} überstehen. Sollte die Probe misslingen, erleiden die Ziele einen negativen Effekt, basierend auf dem Typ des Schadens:
-<indent=5%>Bei {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Trefferschaden{/g} wird das Ziel für 1 Runde {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Stich- und {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechender Schaden{/g} fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} zu.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energie und alle anderen Schadenstypen fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} zu.</indent>
Energieschwerter und -äxte fügen Energieschaden und rüstungsbrechenden Schaden zu, während Energiehämmer Energie- und Trefferschaden verursachen. Angriffe, die mehrere Schadenstypen kombinieren, profitieren von jedem zusätzlichen Effekt.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn der nächste Angriff des Erzmilitanten {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, müssen alle Ziele eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} überstehen. Sollte die Probe misslingen, erleiden die Ziele einen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g}, basierend auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadenstyp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Schlagschaden{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}streckt das Ziel hin{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Stich- und {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Zerreißschäden{/g} fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} zu.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Energie{/g}- und alle anderen Schäden fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} zu.</indent>
Kraftschwerter und -äxte fügen Energie- und Zerreißschäden zu, während Krafthämmer Energie- und Schlagschaden anrichten. Angriffe, die mehrere Schadenstypen kombinieren, profitieren von jedem zusätzlichen Effekt.

Wenn der nächste Angriff des Veteranen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, müssen alle Ziele eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} überstehen. Sollte die Probe misslingen, erleiden die Ziele einen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negativen Effekt{/g}, basierend auf dem Angriffstyp:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Schlagschaden{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}streckt das Ziel hin{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Stich- und {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}Zerreißschäden{/g} fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} zu.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Energie{/g}- und alle anderen Schäden fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} zu.</indent>
Kraftschwerter und -äxte fügen Energie- und Zerreißschäden zu, während Krafthämmer Energie- und Schlagschaden anrichten. Angriffe, die mehrere Schadenstypen kombinieren, profitieren von jedem zusätzlichen Effekt.

Wenn der nächste Angriff des Erzmilitanten {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, müssen alle Ziele eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} überstehen. Sollte die Probe misslingen, erleiden die Ziele einen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g}, basierend auf dem Typ des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Bei {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Trefferschaden{/g} wird das Ziel für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Stich- und {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechender Schaden{/g} fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} zu.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}Energie{/g} und alle anderen Schadenstypen fügen dem Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g} zu.</indent>
Energieschwerter und -äxte fügen Energieschaden und rüstungsbrechenden Schaden zu, während Energiehämmer Energie- und Trefferschaden verursachen. Angriffe, die mehrere Schadenstypen kombinieren, profitieren von jedem zusätzlichen Effekt.

languages.text:
La prochaine attaque de l'archimilitant, à condition qu'elle touche les cibles, contraint celles-ci à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'Endurance avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}. En cas d'échec au test de résistance, les cibles subissent un effet négatif dépendant du type de dégâts de l'attaque :
- <indent=5%>Les {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts d'impact{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysent{/g} la cible pendant 1 round.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Les dégâts perforants et {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}de lacération{/g} infligent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Les dégâts d'énergie et tous les autres types de dégâts infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
Les épées et haches énergétiques sont à la fois comptabilisées dans les dégâts d'énergie et de lacération, tandis que les marteaux énergétiques sont comptabilisés dans les dégâts d'énergie et les dégâts d'impact. Les attaques qui combinent plusieurs types de dégâts bénéficient de chaque effet supplémentaire.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

traits.locale_text:
L'attaque suivante du Vétéran, à condition qu'elle {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} les cibles, contraint celles-ci à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g} ou bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}CA{/g} du Vétéran, selon la valeur la plus élevée)</u>. En cas d'échec au test de résistance, les cibles subissent un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} basé sur le type de dégâts de l'attaque :
- <indent=5%>Les {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts par impact{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}immobilisent{/g} la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Les dégâts perçants et {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}perforants{/g} infligent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Les dégâts d'{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}énergie{/g} et tous les autres types de dégâts infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
Les épées et les haches énergétiques sont à la fois comptabilisés dans les dégâts d'énergie et les dégâts perforants, tandis que les marteaux énergétiques sont comptabilisés dans les dégâts d'énergie et les dégâts par impact. Les attaques qui combinent plusieurs types de dégâts bénéficient de chaque effet supplémentaire.

L'attaque suivante du Vétéran, à condition qu'elle {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} les cibles, contraint celles-ci à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413}. En cas d'échec au test de résistance, les cibles subissent un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} basé sur le type de dégâts de l'attaque :
- <indent=5%>Les {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts par impact{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}immobilisent{/g} la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Les dégâts perçants et {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}perforants{/g} infligent les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
- <indent=5%>Les dégâts d'{g|Encyclopedia:DamageTypes}énergie{/g} et tous les autres types de dégâts infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} à la cible jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
Les épées et les haches énergétiques sont à la fois comptabilisés dans les dégâts d'énergie et les dégâts perforants, tandis que les marteaux énergétiques sont comptabilisés dans les dégâts d'énergie et les dégâts par impact. Les attaques qui combinent plusieurs types de dégâts bénéficient de chaque effet supplémentaire.

languages.text:
Başmilitan'ın bir sonraki saldırısı, vurursa tüm hedeflerin −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmesine sebep olur. Testi geçemeyen hedefler, saldırının hasar türüne bağlı olarak olumsuz bir etkiye maruz kalırlar:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Darbe hasarı{/g}, hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devirir{/g}. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Delme ve {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma hasarı{/g}, hedefte {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlamaya{/g} sebep olur. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enerji ve diğer tüm hasar türleri, hedefte {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşmeye{/g} sebep olur. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
Güç kılıçları ve güç baltaları hem enerji hem de yırtma olarak kabul edilirken güç çekiçleri ise hem enerji hem de darbe olarak sayılır. Birkaç hasar türünü birleştiren saldırılar, tüm ilave etkilerden faydalanır.
languages.original_text:
The Arch-Militant's next attack, if it hits, will cause all the targets to make a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} penalty. If failed, the targets will suffer a negative effect based on the attack's damage type:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Impact damage{/g} knocks the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Piercing and {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Energy and all other damage inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} on the target until the end of combat.</indent>
Power swords and power axes count as both energy and rending, while power hammers count as both energy and impact. Attacks that combine several types of damage will benefit from each additional effect.

traits.locale_text:
Başmilitan'ın bir sonraki saldırısı, vurursa tüm hedeflerin −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fe85384efebb4d38b71738594746e413} ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmesine sebep olur. Testi geçemeyen hedefler, saldırının hasar türüne bağlı olarak olumsuz bir etkiye maruz kalırlar:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Darbe hasarı{/g}, hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devirir{/g}. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Delme ve {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma hasarı{/g}, hedefte kanama ve yavaşlamaya sebep olur. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enerji ve diğer tüm hasar türleri, hedefte körleşmeye sebep olur. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
Güç kılıçları ve güç baltaları hem enerji hem de yırtma olarak kabul edilirken güç çekiçleri ise hem enerji hem de darbe olarak sayılır. Birkaç hasar türünü birleştiren saldırılar, tüm ilave etkilerden faydalanır.
